Explanations about Options.-u:
Use UDP instead of TCP. Cannot be used together with -x. For UNIX-domain sockets,
 use a datagram socket instead of a stream socket. If a UNIX-domain socket is used,
 a temporary receiving socket is created in /tmp unless the -s flag is given.
